category.name: Thin Client.Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEIdGenerationOnAssignEnabled
preference.preference_description: Controls whether the MEIdGenerationPropertySetting preference is used to generate absolute occurrence values (in-context IDs) during the assign action. Valid Values: true - The smart IDIC is generated when assigning from one structure to another. false - The smart IDIC is not generated when assigning from one structure to another. Teamcenter creates IDICs based on the values of the MECopyIdInContextToAssignedLine and MECopyIdInContextLowerLevels preferences.
